```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
X <- read.csv('X.csv', row.names = 1)
Y <- read.csv('Y.csv', row.names = 1)
target <- Y['l2_norm']
```

```{r}
library(glmnet)
X <- scale(X)
```

```{r}
Xdata <- as.matrix(X)
Ydata <- as.matrix(target)
```

```{r}
fit <- glmnet(Xdata, Ydata, alpha = 1)
coef(fit)
```
